original_title: Phases of the Moon: The Parapsychology of Everyday Life
overview: “I usually avoid the term ‘film poem,’ because it was overused in the ‘40s and ‘50s. But somehow it fits Phases of The Moon; it is a film poem and nothing else. A small, miniature film poem, a jewel, if the word masterpiece is too stuffy.” (Jonas Mekas, 1973)
title: Phases of the Moon: The Parapsychology of Everyday Life
